title: Return & Refund Policy
description: Maive delivers digital products and services which are non-returnable by nature. As such, we do not offer refunds once a digital delivery is confirmed.

list.title: However, exceptions will be made in the following cases:

items.content: Service delivery failure on our part
Technical issues during download or access

list.conclusion: In such cases, please contact us at themaive.in@gmail.com within 7 days of purchase. We will investigate and either provide a replacement or issue a refund, at our sole discretion.
